Comes in 6 different metallic colors, this refillable perfume bottle helps you organizing your different scents. 【 EASY REFILL TRAVEL PERFUME BOTTLE REFILLABLE 】 Innovated design with a valve on the base of perfume atomizer, different from the common mister spray bottle, it's easy to refill. Remove the top of your perfume sprayer and insert the tube into the base of the atomizer. Then pump to fill. With each push, perfume sprays into the Atomizer. Finish the refill when its filled, but Do not overfill. Before filling the liquid, squeeze the travel size bottles to remove the air to prevent liquid leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for business trips and travel instead of bringing my large bottle of cologne, especially for carry on limits. So far it has been great. Very easy to fill from the base, and the spray work perfectly once filled. It would be enough to last 1-2 weeks, if I use 2-3 sprays every day (I don't use cologne daily, so it seems to really last). The only one thing is that it leaked when bringing onto the plane due to air pressure, but this would essentially happen to anything with liquids. Overall, I would disregard the leaking, as I put it in a sealable bag with some tissue. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE This 😍 You Will Too!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m no longer spending money on travel size versions of my perfumes! Take your expensive large bottles and use these for travel or throw them into your purse to refresh through out the day/night. Love the color options so that my husband or son can use for their colognes! I used the tiny funnel and just poured my perfumes in. Super easy!!! Kit included 2 extra spray nozzles too! All for $8.00 where a travel size of my perfumes can run up to $30 and are 10ml or smaller. I prefer this larger 12 ml compared to a 8 or a 4. This allows me to take this for travel for several weeks. The spray is not too large but not too small. It covers a nice range of skin on my neck but not too big for my wrist. Love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work like advertised
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a set of Perfume Travel Refillable Mini Spray Bottles Atomizer and I'm really happy with them! They are the perfect solution for taking your favorite fragrances on the go. I have always hated carrying around large, bulky perfume bottles, so these mini atomizers are a lifesaver.**Here are some of the pros and cons of these atomizers:****Pros:*** **Compact and portable:** These atomizers are small and lightweight, so they are easy to toss in your purse or travel bag.* **Leak-proof:** I haven't had any problems with these atomizers leaking, even when I've thrown them in my bag.* **Easy to refill:** The atomizers have a simple pump-to-fill system that makes refilling them quick and easy.* **Durable:** I've dropped these atomizers a few times and they haven't broken.* **Affordable:** These atomizers are very affordable, especially when you buy them in a set.**Cons:*** **Limited capacity:** Each atomizer only holds 5ml of perfume, so you may need to refill it frequently if you use it often.* **Not suitable for all perfumes:** Some perfumes with thick consistency may not work well with these atomizers.**Here are some tips for using these atomizers:*** **Before filling the atomizer, spray a few times into the air to clear out any air bubbles.*** **Don't overfill the atomizer, as this can cause it to leak.*** **Store the atomizer in a cool, dry place.****Overall, I would highly recommend these Perfume Travel Refillable Mini Spray Bottles Atomizer. They are a great way to take your favorite fragrances on the go without having to lug around a bulky perfume bottle.****Here are some additional details about the product:*** **Material:** Glass and aluminum* **Capacity:** 5ml* **Colors:** Available in a variety of colors* **Price:** $10-$15 for a set of 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not all leak proof
reviews.reviewText: Most of the bottles worked great but if the 4 I've used 1 of them leaked right out of the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are larger (12 ml instead of 10 ml) than some others I have. Having different colors (which are all pretty) is nice. I gifted some DIY fragrances to the ladies in my family, and I'm pretty sure they liked the bottles as much as they did the fragrances!These, thankfully, do NOT leak. The glass tubes fit VERY tightly inside the metal cylinders, and that's a good thing for when traveling, but it does take some effort to remove them. The accessories are really decent. I was worried they would be flimsy, but they work really well. I especially like the metal funnels because they are the right size & don't tip over the container.If I have to buy more atomizers, it will be these. I actually came back for this set after buying one a few days before. They are that nice & I love the pricing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes in handy
reviews.reviewText: These are very handy and great for traveling with. They all spray perfectly fine. Need to order more for all my perfumes😭 They don’t fit all bottles of perfume though, that’s my only issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used these for a long trip. They were easy to fill but one leaked after two weeks and one slow leaked for two weeks. Probably better quality out here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product! Perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Yeah, so I recently went to a conference and couldn't pack any of my scents so I purchased these to transport my fragrances with me. Easy to fill and none have leaked yet. Atomizers provide great dispersal area. Super happy with this purchase. And ironically, I have 5 colognes and 5 of the bottles match the colors. Anyone has suggestions for a EdP cologne that would aesthetically match the pink atomizer? Lol!
